title: The Life of Harry Dare
creator_credit: Aleski Vellis, Terry J. Charatsis, Australian Film Commission, Infinity Pictures and South Australian Film Corporation
brief_description: Harry Dare’s troubles began the day he sighted the Kombi van and despite the warnings of ‘Bad Spirit Trouble’, he just had to have it. When the van is stolen, Harry embarks on a journey with his young estranged son Jim to find it. What Harry really discovers is a more meaningful relationship with his son. Stars John Moore as Harry and Aaron Wilton as Jim.
